manzils.text: Ta, xi, mi mu [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhexie shi mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [“gulanjing”] de jing wen.
Youyu tamen bu xinyang, ni [mu sheng] yexu hui beifen shang shen.
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo neng cong tianshang jiang gei tamen yi zhong jixiang, tamen jiang wei ci fushou tingming.
Mei dang [“gulanjing” zhong] you xin de qishi cong pu ci zhi zhu [an la] jianglin tamen, tamen zong shi beiqi ta.
Tamen que yi fouren zhenli [“gulanjing”], tamen suo chaoxiao zhishi de houguo jiang jianglin tamen.
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha dadi, wo zenyang shi ge zhong meili de zhiwu shengzhang qizhong ma?
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Dangshi, ni de zhu zhaohuan mu sa [zhu][shuo]:“Ni qu jiaohua bu yi de renmin——
falao de renmin ba! Nandao tamen hai bu jingwei [an la] ma?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo dique pa tamen bu xiangxin wo,
wo xiongzhong yumen, wo de shetou ye bu lingminle, suoyi, qiu ni paiqian [wo di gege] ha lun [pei wo qu].
Tamen zhikong wo yi xiang zui, wo pa tamen hui shahai wo.”
Ta [an la] shuo:“Jue bu hui de! Ni lia daizhe wo de jixiang qu ba! Wo dique yu nimen tong zai bing qingting [nimen de qiqiu].
Ni lia jian dao falao shi dang [dui ta] shuo:“Wo lia que shi zhong shijie zhi zhu [an la] paiqian lai de shizhe,
qing ni rang yiselie de houyi tong women yiqi likai ba!”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou zai women de jiazhong ba ni [mu sa] dang haizi yang da, erqie ni tong women yiqi shenghuoguo xuduo nian ma?
Ni zuoguo ni suo zuo di na jian shi [sharen], ni shi yige wang'enfuyi de ren.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wo zuoguo na jian shi, dan na shi wo [dui an la ji qi qishi] shi wuzhi de.
Youyu wo weiju nimen, suoyi wo taolile nimen. Zhihou, wo de zhu ci gei wo zhihui [zongjiao zhi shi], bing renming wo zuo shizhe.
Ni nuyile yiselie de houyi, zhe jiushi ni zebei wo wang'en ma?”
Falao shuo:“Zhong shijie de zhu shi shenme?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“[Ta] shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, jiaru nimen quexin.”
Ta [falao] dui zhouwei de ren shuo:“Nandao nimen meiyou tingjian [mu sa suo shuo de] ma?”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“[Ta] shi nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Bei paiqian lai jiaohua nimen de zhe wei shizhe yiding shige fengzi.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“[Ta] shi dongfang he xifang ji qizhong yiqie de zhu, jiaru nimen mingli.”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Jiaru ni she wo er ling xuan zhuzai, wo bi shi ni chengwei qiufan.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Yaoshi wo xiang ni xianshi yixie ling ren xinfu de shi ne?”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Ni xianshi ba! Jiaru ni shuo de shi shihua.”
Yushi ta [mu sa] jiu reng chu ta de shouzhang, na shouzhang turan bian chengle yitiao zhenzheng de dashe.
Ranhou, ta [cong ye xia] chouchu shou lai, na shou zai guanzhong mianqian turan bian de jiebai yaoyan.
Ta [falao] dui zhouwei de shoulingmen shuo:“Zhe que shi yi wei jingzhan de moshu shi,
ta xiang yong ta de moshu ba nimen zhu chu nimen de guotu, nimen you he gaojian?”
Tamen shuo:“Qing ni zanqie bieguan ta he ta di gege, qing ni paiqian chuanling guan dao ge chengshi qu,
Rang tamen ba suoyou jingzhan de moshu shi [zhu] dou zhao lai jian ni.”
Moshu shimen zai guiding zhi ri anshi jihe qilaile.
Youren dui renmen shuo:“Nimen dou jihe haole ma?
Jiaru moshu shimen huoshengle, women yexu hui zhuisui tamen.”
Dang moshu shimen daoda shi, tamen dui falao shuo:“Jiaru women huoshengle, women hui huode baochou [jiangli] ma?”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Shi de, na shi nimen yiding hui chengwei wo qinxin de ren.”
Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen reng [biaoyan] nimen yao reng [biaoyan] de dongxi ba!”
Yushi tamen jiu reng chu tamen de shengzi he shouzhang. Tamen shuo:“Yi falao de quanli fashi! Women yiding shi huosheng zhe.”
Jiezhe mu sa jiu reng chu ta de shouzhang, na shouzhang turan tunmole tamen suo biaoyan de huanshu.
Yushi moshu shimen zhihao baidao xiaqu.
Tamen shuo:“Women xinyang zhong shijie de zhule,
ji mu sa he ha lun de zhu.”

Ta [falao] shuo:“Zai wo zhunxu nimen zhiqian, nimen gan xiangxin ta [mu sa] ma? Ta yiding shi nimen de shouling, yiding shi ta jiaoshou nimen moshu de. Nimen bujiu jiang zhidao, wo yiding yao jiaocuo kan qu nimen de shoujiao, wo yiding yao ba nimen quanbu ding si zai shizijia shang.”
Tamen shuo:“Meiguanxi, women yiding yao chong gui women de zhu [an la].
Women zhen de kewang women de zhu hui kuanshu women de guoshi, yinwei women shi shouxian xinyang de.”
Wo qishi mu sa [zhu]:“Ni shuailing wo de pu renmen zai yejian chuzou ba! Yinwei nimen bi jiang bei [falao ji qi jundui] zhuigan.”
Falao paiqian chuanling guan dao ge chengshi qu [shuo]:
“Zhexie ren zhishi yi xiaohuo ren,
tamen dique jinule wo,
women dique you qiangda de jundui.”
Yinci, wo [an la] ba tamen zhu chule [tamen de] guoyuan, quanshui,
caibao he haozhai.
Shishi jiushi zheyang. Wo shi yiselie de houyi jichengle ta [shangshu caichan].
Tamen [falao de jundui] zai ri chu shi zhuigan tamen.
Dang shuangfang huxiang neng kanjian shi, mu sa de tongbanmen shuo:“Women kuai bei zhui shangle!”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Jue bu hui de! Wo de zhu dique yu wo tong zai, ta hui yindao wo de.”
Yinci, wo qishi mu sa:“Ni yong ni de shouzhang da haishui ba!” Yushi haishui jiu fenkaile, mei yibufen dou xiang yizuo dashan.
Wo rang qiyu de ren [falao de jundui] jiejin na difang.
Wo zhengjiule mu sa ji tong ta zai yiqi de suoyou ren,
ranhou, wo yan sile qiyu de ren [falao de jundui].
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Ni dang xiang tamen jiangshu yi bu la xin de gushi [zhu].
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zuren shuo:“Nimen chongbai de shi shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women chongbai ouxiang, women yizhi qiancheng gongfeng tamen.”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Nimen qiqiu [tamen] shi, tamen neng tingjian ma?
Huozhe tamen neng ci fu gei nimen ma? Huozhe tamen neng jiang huo gei nimen ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Bu, dan women faxian women de zuxian yeshi zheyang zuo de.”
Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Nimen zhidao nimen he nimen de zuxian suo chongbai de shi shenme ma?
Tamen que shi wo de diren, er zhong shijie de zhu [an la] ze bushi.
Ta [an la] chuangzao wo bing yindao wo;
ta gong wo chi de, ci wo yin de;
wo huan bing [zhu] shi, ta shi wo quanyu;
ta jiang shi wo siwang, ranhou you ba wo fuhuo;
shenpan ri, wo xiwang ta neng kuanshu wo de guocuo.”
[Yi bu la xin you shuo]:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni ci gei wo zhihui [zongjiao zhishi], qiu ni shi wo jinru shan renmen zhi lie;
qiu ni ci wo zai hou ren zhong xiangyou mei ming;
qiu ni shi wo chengwei enze de leyuan de jicheng zhe;
qiu ni kuanshu wo de fuqin, yinwei ta que shi mi wu zhe;
zai tamen [renlei] bei fuhuo di na ri, qiu ni buyao lingru wo [zhu];
zai na ri, caichan he er nujiang hao wu yichu;
wei daizhe yi ke chunjie de xin [wei baiguo ouxiang he wei xin deng] lai jian an la de ren liwai.”
[Zai na ri], leyuan jiang bei dai dao jingwei zhe fujin,
huo yu jiang bei zhanshi zai mi wu zhe mianqian.
You hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yiqian she an la er chongbai de ouxiang [xianzai] zai nali? Tamen neng bangzhu nimen ma? Tamen neng zijiu ma?”
Jiang bei touru huo yu de ren shi: Tamen he mi wu zhe,
yiji yi bu lisi de suoyou buxia.
Tamen jiang zai huo yu li zhengbian shuo:
“Yi an la fashi! Women yiqian que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.
Dangshi, women ba nimen [ouxiang] yu zhong shijie de zhu [an la] tong shou chongbai.
Dique shi fanzui zhe [ru yi bu lisi, zuo'e zhe deng] shi women mi wu de.
[Xianzai], women meiyou renhe qiuqing zhe [neng ti women qiuqing],
meiyou renhe qinmi de pengyou [neng bangzhu women].
Yaoshi women you jihui fanhui [chenshi] duo hao a![Na shi] women yiding zuo xinshi.”
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Nu ha de zuren ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, tamen de xiongdi nu ha ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.”
Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] shuo:“[Zhiyou women zhong] yixie zui beijian de ren zai zhuisui ni, women neng xiangxin ni ma?”
Ta [nu ha] shuo:“Wo bu zhidao tamen cengjing suo zuo de.
Tamen de qingsuan you wo de zhu [an la] fuze [zhu], jiaru nimen zhidao.
Wo jue bu hui quzhu xinshimen.
Wo zhishi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Tamen shuo:“Nu ha a! Jiaru ni bu tingzhi [xuanchuan], ni bi jiang bei shitou da si.”
Ta [nu ha] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zuren que yi fouren wo,
qiu ni zai wo he tamen zhi jian panjue, qiu ni zhengjiu wo he tong wo zai yiqi de xinshimen.”
Wo zhengjiule ta he tong ta yiqi zai manzai de chuan zhong zhe.
Ranhou, wo yan sile qiyu de ren [bu xinyang zhe].
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
A de ren ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, tamen de xiongdi hudeceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Nimen zai mei ge gao dishang jianzao gongdian er bu zhu qizhong ma?
Nimen [wei ziji] jianzao [piaoliang de] gongdian, haoxiang nimen keyi changsheng bulao.
Nimen chengfa bieren shi, nimen youru baojun yiyang chengfa.
Suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Nimen dang jingwei ta [an la], shi ta yi nimen suo bu zhidao de [haoshi] yuanzhu nimen.
Ta ci gei nimen shengchu he ernu,
guoyuan he quanshui.
Wo dique pa nimen zaoshou zhongda zhi ri de xingfa.”
Tamen shuo:“Wulun ni quangao women, haishi bu quangao women, dui women dou shi yiyang de.
Zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan eryi.
Women jue bu hui shou chengfa.”
Tamen fouren ta [hu de], suoyi, wo huimiele tamen. Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Sa mu de ren ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, tamen de xiongdi sa li ha ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Nandao nimen renwei nimen neng chang'an leyu nimen muqian de xianzhuang ma?
Ji you guoyuan he quanshui,
you nongtian [zhuangjia] he jiaonen de rou suihua xu de ye zao shu,
yiji nimen shulian de zao shan wei wu.
Nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Nimen buyao fucong fanzui zhe de mingling,
tamen [fanzui zhe] zai da dishang zuo'e er bu huiguo zi xin.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige bei mihuo de ren,
ni zhishi yige tong women yiyang de fanren. Jiaru ni shuo de shi shihua, ni jiu [gei women] xianshi yi zhong jixiang ba!”
Ta [sa li ha] shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhi mu tuo [zhu], zai guiding de yirizhong, ta you quan yinshui, nimen yeyou quan yinshui.
Nimen buke shanghai ta, fouze, zhongda zhi ri de xingfa bi chengzhi nimen.”
Dan tamen shale ta, suihou, tamen you houhuile.
Yushi xingfa chengzhile tamen. Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Lu te de zuren [yuan juzhu yu balesitan de suo duo ma cheng] ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, tamen de xiongdi lu te ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Nandao nimen yao yu renlei zhong de nanxing manzu xingyu [tongxinglian],
er fangqi nimen de zhu [an la] wei nimen chuangzao de nimen de qizi ma? Bu, nimen shi zuo'e de minzhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Lu te a! Jiaru ni bu tingzhi [xuanchuan], ni bi jiang bei fangzhu.”
Ta [lu te] shuo:“Wo feichang zengwu nimen de xingwei [tongxinglian].
Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhengjiu wo he wo de jiaren yuan bi tamen suo zuo de [chouxing].”
Yinci, wo zhengjiule ta he ta de quanjia,
youyi wei lao fu [ta de qizi] chuwai, ta shi shuyu liu zai houmian [shou chengfa] de ren.
Ranhou, wo huimiele qiyu de ren.
Wo jiang [shi] yu chengfa tamen. Bei jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zhen elie!
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Conglin de jumin ceng fouren [tamen de] shizhemen.
Dangshi, shu abu ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen hai bu jingwei [yu shuncong an la] ma?
Wo dui nimen que shi yi wei zhongshi de shizhe,
suoyi, nimen dang jingwei an la, dang fucong wo.
Wo bu hui wei ci [chuanda shiming] xiang nimen suoqu baochou de, wo de baochou zhi laizi zhong shijie de zhu [an la].
Nimen dang yong biaozhun di chi [liang wu], nimen buyao kekou [renmen ying de zhi wu];
nimen dang yong zhunque de cheng cheng [zhu],
nimen buyao kekou renmen ying de zhi wu. Nimen buyao zai da dishang weifeizuodai.
Nimen dang jingwei chuangzao nimen he [nimen de] qian ren de zhu [an la].”
Tamen shuo:“Ni [shu abu] zhishi yige bei mihuo de ren,
ni zhishi tong women yiyang de fanren. Women dou renwei ni shi shuohuang zhe.
Jiaru ni shuo de shi shihua, ni jiu shi yikuai tian luo dao women de tou shang ba!”
Ta [shu abu] shuo:“Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, wo de zhu quan zhidao.”
Dan tamen fouren ta, suoyi yin'an [wuyun] zhi ri de xingfa chengzhile tamen, na jiushi zhongda zhi ri de xingfa.
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu xinyang.
Ni de zhu que shi quanneng de, te ci de.
Zhe bu “gulanjing” que shi zhong shijie zhi zhu [an la] de qishi.
[An la tongguo] zhongshi de shengling [ji bu li lei tianshi] ba ta [“gulanjing”] jiang zai ni [mu sheng] de xinzhong, yibian ni yong mingbai de alabo wen [zhu] jinggao renlei.
Ta [“gulanjing”] zai qian ren [shou ci] de jingdian [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei”] zhong dique bei ti daoguo,
yiselie de houyi zhong de xuezhemen [ru gui xin yisilan jiao de abu du la•ben•se lia mu] zhidao ta [que shi zhenshi de]. Zhe dui tamen [mai jia ren] nandao bushi yi zhong jixiang ma?
Jiaru wo ba ta [“gulanjing”] jiang gei yige fei alabo ren,
nage ren xiang tamen songdu ta [“gulanjing”], name, tamen shi jue bu hui xiangxin de.
Wo ruci shi ta [fouren “gulanjing”] jinru fanzui zhe de xinzhong.
Chufei tamen kanjian tongku de xingfa, fouze, tamen jue bu hui xiangxin ta [“gulanjing”].
Na xingfa jiang zai tamen buzhi bu jue shi turan jianglin tamen.
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women neng bei huanxing ma?”
Nandao tamen [bushi] xiwang wo de xingfa zaori shixian ma?
Ni gaosu wo ba! Jiaru wo rang tamen xiangle shu nian,
ranhou, tamen suo bei jinggao de xingfa jianglin tamen,
tamen [yiqian] suo xiangshou de dui tamen you he yichu ne?
Fanshi wo suo huimie de chengshi [de renmin],[zhiqian] dou you jinggao zhe jiaohuiguo, wo bu hui xing bu yi.
Emomen jue buneng daizhe ta [“gulanjing”] jiang shi,
tamen [emo] ji bu shiyi zuo ci shi, tamen ye wuneng zheyang zuo.
Tamen bei zhu yuan er bu zhun ting [“gulanjing”].
Ni buyao ji qiqiu an la, you qiqiu qita shenling, fouze, ni bi chengwei shou chengfa de ren.
Ni [mu sheng] dang jinggao ni de qinshu de buluo [zhu].
Ni dang qianhe di duidai zhuisui ni de xinshimen.
Jiaru tamen weikang ni, ni [dang dui tamen] shuo:“Wo yu nimen suo zuo de [e xing] que shi hao wu guanxi de.”
Ni dang xinlai quanneng de zhu, te ci de zhu [an la].
Dang ni [mu sheng] zhan qi libai shi, ta [an la] kanjian ni,
bing kanjian ni lu zhong [libai] koutou de dongzuo.
Ta que shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.
[Renmen a]! Yao wo gaosu nimen emomen hui jiang zai shei de shenshang ma?
Tamen hui jiang zai mei ge zaoyao zhe, fanzui zhe de shenshang.
Tamen [zaoyao zhe, fanzui zhe] ce'er qingting [emo de wangyan], tamen da duoshu ren shi shuohuang zhe.
Zhiyu shirenmen, wei mi wu zhe zhuisuizhe tamen.
Nandao ni buzhidao tamen [shirenmen] yanjiang ge zhong timu di shi [zhu] ma?
Tamen kongtan kuo lun er bu shijian.
Fan xinyang, xingshan, chang zan nian an la,[yong shi] hui ying bu yi zhi shi [yi jiao shiren feibang musilin de shi] zhe chuwai. Bu yi zhe hen kuai jiang zhidao ziji hui huode he zhong guisu.
Ta, xi [alabo yu er ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi]. Zhexie shi “gulanjing” de jing wen, shi yi bu mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [de jing wen],
shi dui xinshimen de yindao he jiayin.
Tamen [xinshi] jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, quexin houshi [zhu].
Zhiyu bu xinyang houshi zhe, wo yi tamen de xingwei fenshi tamen, yin'er tamen paihuai mangcong.
[Zai jinshi], zhexie ren bi zao yanxing; zai houshi, tamen que shi zui sunshi zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] que yi shou ci cong zui ruizhi de, quanzhi de zhu jiang shi de “gulanjing”.

Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de jiaren shuo:“Wo que yi kanjian [yuan chu you] yige huoguang, wo jiang cong nali gei nimen dai hui yixie xiaoxi lai, huo gei nimen dai hui yige ranshaozhe de huoba lai, yi gong nimen qunuan.”
Dang ta daoda huoguang chu shi, you shengyin han dao:“Zai huo fujin ji qi zhouwei de ren bei ci fule. Zanmei an la——zhong shijie de zhu chaojue!
Mu sa a! Zhe jiushi wo, shi an la, shi quanneng de zhu, shi zui ruizhi de zhu.

Ni reng xia ni de shouzhang ba!” Dang ta kanjian na shouzhang xiang she yiyang wan yan yidong shi, ta jiu zhuanshen taoli er bu gan huigu.[An la shuo]:“Mu sa a! Ni buyao haipa, shizhemen zai wo zheli bubi haipa.
Dan xing bu yi hou gaiguo cong shan zhe chuwai. Wo que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Ni bashou charu huai zhong, ni chouchu shi jiang bian de jiebai yaoyan, meiyou renhe shanghai. Zhe [liang zhong jixiang] shi ni jiang xian gei falao he ta de renmin de jiu zhong jixiang de yibufen. Tamen que shi beini de minzhong.”
Dang wo de jixiang jianglin tamen shi, mingbai kejian, dan tamen queshuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”
Suiran tamen de neixin quexin naxie jixiang [shi cong an la jiang shi de, mu sa shi an la de shizhe], dan tamen reng bu yi he aoman de jiayi fouren. Ni dang guancha zuo'e zhe de jieju ruhe!
Wo que yi ci gei da wude he su lai man zhishi. Ta lia shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, shi ta shi women you yu ta de xuduo xinyang de puren.”
Su lai man jichengle da wude [de zhishi]. Ta [da wude] shuo:“Renmen a! Women yi bei jiaoshou niao yu, women yi bei ciyu wanwu, zhe que shi [cong an la jiang shi de] mingxian de enhui.”
You jingling, renlei he niao lei zucheng de su lai man de jundui bei jihe dao ta mianqian, tamen pailie zhengqi [daiming chuzheng].
Dang tamen daoda mayi [zhu] gu shi, yi zhi [mu] mayi shuo:“Mayimen a! Nimen gankuai duo jin nimen de dong zhong qu ba! Yimian su lai man he ta de jundui zai bu zhi bu jue shi cai si nimen.”

Ta [su lai man] bei na zhi mayi dehua [zhu] douxiaole, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni guwu wo [bing ci wo liliang], yibian wo ganxie ni ci wo he wo fumu de enhui, yibian wo zuo ni suo xiyue de shangong. Qiu ni yi ni de enhui rang wo jinru ni de shanliang de puren zhi lie.”
Ta jianyue zhong niao bing shuo:“Wo zenme mei kanjian dai sheng niao ne? Ta [wugu] quexile ma?
Chufei ta gei wo dai lai yi xiang heli de yuanyin, fouze, wo yiding yao yancheng ta, huo sha si ta.”
Na zhi dai sheng niao tingliu bujiu jiu laile, ta [dui su lai man] shuo:“Wo zhidao [yi jian] ni suo bu zhidao de shi, wo cong sa ba gei ni dai laile yige kekao de xiaoxi.
Wo faxian you wei funu tongzhizhe ta de zuren. Ta yingyoujinyou, hai you yige xiongwei de baozuo.
Wo faxian ta he ta de zuren dou she an la er chongbai taiyang, emo yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, bing zuzhi tamen zou zhengdao, yin'er tamen wei zunxing zhengdao.
Yizhi tamen bu chongbai an la——na jieshi tiandi aomi de zhu. Fanshi nimen suo yincang de he gongkai de, ta [an la] quan zhidao.
An la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, ta shi weida baozuo [zhu] de zhu.” Koutou chu
ta [su lai man] shuo:“Wo yao kan ni shuo de shi shihua haishi huangyan.
Ni daizhe wo de zhe feng xin qu, ba ta tou song gei tamen, ranhou ni jiu likai tamen, kan tamen ruhe huifu.”
Ta [nage nuwang] shuo:“Zhong qing a! Wo shou daole yi feng guizhong de xin,
shi su lai man pai ren song lai de. Xin de neirong shi:“Feng pu ci te ci de an la zhi ming.
Nimen buyao dui wo aoman, nimen dang guishun de [zuowei musilin] lai jian wo.”
Ta shuo:“Zhong qing a! Nimen wei wo de shi chu ge zhuyi ba! Nimen buzai wo mianqian shi, wo cong bu jueding renhe shi.”
Tamen shuo:“Women you wuli he yongqi zhandou, zhe jian shi jiu you ni jueding, ni zhi xu kaolu ruhe xialing jiuxingle.”
Ta shuo:“Mei dang guowangmen [de jundui] jinru yige chengshi shi, tamen bi qiangjie nage chengshi, ba guizu bian wei jianmin. Tamen ye hui zheyang zuo de.
Wo yiding yao song yi jian liwu gei tamen, ranhou, kan [wo de] shijiemen neng dai hui shenme xiaoxi lai.”

Dang ta de shijie [ji liwu] daoda su lai man nali shi, ta [su lai man] shuo:“Nimen yao yong caiwu lai zizhu wo ma?[Xuzhi] an la ciyu wo de bi ta [an la] ciyu nimen de geng hao. Bu, nimen qu xinshang nimen de liwu ba!”

[Ranhou su lai man dui shijie de shouling shuo]:“Ni huiqu gaosu tamen ba! Wo yiding yao shuailing zhe zhi tamen wufa dikang de jundui qu taofa tamen, wo yiding yao ba tamen beijian de quzhu chujing, tamen jiang hui bian cheng beijian de.”
Ta [su lai man] shuo:“Zhong qing a! Zai tamen guishun de [zuowei musilin] lai jian wo zhiqian, nimen shei neng ba ta de baozuo qu lai gei wo?”
Yige qiangzhuang de jingling shuo:“Zai ni li xi qian, wo yiding ba ta qu lai gei ni. Wo dique you nengli zuo zhe jian shi, dique zhongshi kekao.”

Yi wei you [an la de] jingdian zhishi de ren shuo:“Wo jiang zai zhuanyan zhi jian ba ta qu lai gei ni.” Dang ta [su lai man] kanjian nage baozuo fang zai ta de mianqian shi, ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de zhu ciyu de enhui, ta yi ci lai kaoyan wo, kan wo shi gan'en zhe haishi wang'enfuyi zhe. Shei gan'en, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wang'enfuyi,[shei zi shou qi hai]. Wo de zhu que shi wu suo qiu de [zhu], zungui de.”
Ta [su lai man] shuo:“Nimen ba ta de baozuo gaizhuang yixia, yibian women guancha ta shi keyi yindao de [ren chu ta de baozuo], haishi bu keyi yindao de.”

Dang ta lai dao shi, youren [dui ta] shuo:“Ni de baozuo xiang zhege ma?” Ta shuo:“Zhe haoxiang shi wo de baozuo.”[Su lai man shuo]:“Zai ta zhiqian, women yi shou ci zhishi, women yi shi guishun zhe [musilin].”
Ta she an la er chongbai de yi fang'ai ta [gui xin'an la], ta yuan shi bu xinyang de minzhong.

Youren dui ta shuo:“Ni jin na zuo gongdian qu ba!” Dang ta kanjian na zuo gongdian shi, ta yiwei na shige shuichi, yushi jiu [juan qi yifu] guangzhe shuang tui [xiang jinqu]. Ta [su lai man] shuo:“Zhe shi yige yong guanghua boli jiancheng de gongdian.” Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi shi ziji shou sun, wo [xianzai] tong su lai man yiqi guishun an la ¬——zhong shijie de zhule.”

Wo que yi xiang sa mu de ren paiqianle tamen de xiongdi sa li ha.[Wo shuo]:“Nimen dang chongbai [du yi de] an la.” Dan tamen mashang fenchengle liang pai [xinshi yu bu xinyang zhe], zhenglun buxiu [zhu].
Ta [sa li ha] shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Weisheme nimen zai [an la de] enhui jianglin qian yao xingfa zaori shixian ne? Weisheme nimen bu qiu an la kuanshu, yibian nimen shou ci min ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Youyu ni he zhuisui ni de ren, women yi [shou qianlian er] zao eyun.” Ta shuo:“Nimen de eyun shi an la zhuding [zhu] de. Bu, nimen shi ying shou kaoyan de minzhong.”
Dangshi cheng li you jiu geren [shouling zhizi], tamen zai da dishang zuo'e er bu huiguo zi xin.

Tamen [mimou] shuo:“Nimen yi an la fashi: Women yiding zai yejian mouhai ta [sa li ha] he ta de jiaren, ranhou, women jiu dui ta de jinqin shuo:“Ta de jiaren beihai shi, women bu zaichang, women shuo de dou shi shihua.”
Tamen gao yinmou, wo zai tamen buzhi bu jue shi yong jimou.
Ni dang guancha tamen de yinmou de jieju ruhe! Wo ba tamen he tamen de minzhong dou huimiele.
Zhexie shi tamen de fangwu, yinwei tamen xing bu yi er bei huimiele. Dui you zhishi de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang [jiaoxun].
Wo zhengjiule xinyang bing jingwei [an la] zhe.
[Wo que yi paiqian] lu te. Dangshi, ta dui ta de zuren shuo:“Nandao nimen yao mingmuzhangdan de gan choushi [jianyin] ma?
Nandao nimen zhen de yao she nuren er yu nanren manzu xingyu ma [tongxinglian]? Bu, nimen shi yumei wuzhi de minzhong.”
Dan ta de zuren suozuo de weiyi dafu zhishi shuo:“Nimen ba lu te de jiaren quzhu chu nimen de chengshi ba! Yinwei tamen que shi zicheng chunjie de ren.”
Wo zhengjiule ta he ta de jiaren, ta de qizi chuwai, wo zhuding ta tong liu zai houmian de ren yiqi shouxing.
Wo jiang [shi] yu chengfa tamen, bei jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zhen elie!

Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la. Qiu zhu ciyu tasuo xuanze de pu renmen ping'an!”[Ni wen wen tamen]:“Shi an la geng hao ne [zhu]? Haishi tamen suo chongbai de [ouxiang] geng hao?”[Dangran an la shi zui hao de.]

Nandao chuangzao tiandi, bing wei nimen cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shengzhang chu meili de guoyuan de zhu bushi zui hao de ma? Nimen shi wuneng shi yuan zhong de shumu shengzhang de. Chu an la wai, hai you qita shenling ma? Bu, tamen shi mishi zhengdao de minzhong.

Nandao shi dadi chengwei anju zhi suo, shi zhu heliu xiang qijian, zai qizhong wengu de anzhi qun shan, bing zai liang hai [xian hai yu danhai] zhi jian shezhi yige [yinxing] pingzhang de zhu bushi zui hao de ma? Chu an la wai, hai you qita shenling ma? Bu, tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.

Nandao yingda shounan zhe de qidao [zhu] bing wei qi jiechu zainan, qie shi nimen [shi shidai dai] chengwei dadi jicheng zhe de zhu bushi zui hao de ma? Chu an la wai, hai you qita shenling ma? Dan nimen hen shao sikao.

Nandao zai ludi he haiyang de chongchong hei'an zhong yindao nimen, bing zai ta jiang en [yu] qian pai feng bao jiayin de zhu bushi zui hao de ma? Chu an la wai, hai you qita shenling ma? Zhigaowushang de an la chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.

Nandao chuangzao wanwu, ranhou hai jiang zai chuangzao [fuhuo], bing cong tiandi jian wei nimen tigong jiyang de zhu bushi zui hao de ma? Chu an la wai, hai you qita shenling ma? Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, nimen na chu nimen de zhengju lai ba!”
Ni shuo:“Chu an la wai, tiandi jian wu ren neng zhidao wei jian zhi wu, tamen ye bu zhidao ziji he shi bei fuhuo.”
Bu, shi tamen dui houshi de zhishi yi wu suo zhi. Bu, shi tamen zai huaiyi houshi. Bu, shi tamen kan bujian houshi.
Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Nandao women he women de zuxian [si hou] bian cheng chentu shi, women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo ma?
Yiqian, women he women de zuxian que yi shouguo ci lei jinggao. Zhe zhishi qian ren de fengsu xiguan eryi.”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Nimen dang zai da dishang luxing, guancha fanzui zhe de jieju ruhe!”
Ni buyao wei tamen [de beini] beishang, ni buyao wei tamen suo shuanong de yinmou kunao.
Tamen [bu xinyang zhe] shuo:“Jiaru ni [mu sheng] shi chengshi zhe, zhege jinggao he shi shixian ne?”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen yaoqiu zaori shixian de [xingfa], youxie yexu jianglin nimenle.”
Ni de zhu dui renlei que shi you hong en de, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu gan'en.
Fanshi tamen de xiongzhong suo yincang de he tamen suo gongkai de, ni de zhu quanzhidao.
Tiandi jian de yiqie yincang zhi wu, dou yi jilu zai yi bu mingbai de tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong.
Zhe bu “gulanjing” dique yi ba yiselie de houyi suo zhenglun de da bufen shiyou gaosu tamen [zhu].
Zhe bu “gulanjing” dique shi dui xinshimen de yindao he ci min.
Ni de zhu bi jiang yi ta de falu wei tamen [yiselie de houyi] panjue. Ta shi quanneng de, quan zhi de.
Ni [mu sheng] dang xinlai an la, yinwei ni dique juyou mingbai de zhenli.
Ni jue buneng shi sizhe tingjian [zhu][ni de xuanjiao], ye jue buneng shi zhuanshen likai de longzi tingjian ni de zhaohuan.
Ni geng buneng yindao xiazi tuoli tamen de mi wu, ni zhi neng shi xinyang wo de qishi zhe tingjian ni de zhaohuan, yinwei tamen shi guishun zhe [musilin].

Dang tamen shoudao xingfa de panjue shi, wo jiang shi yi zhong dongwu cong di zhong chulai shanghai tamen, na dongwu jiang tong tamen jianghua [zhu], yin wei renlei bu chengxin wo de qishi [mu sheng he “gulanjing”].
Zai na ri, wo jiang cong mei ge minzu zhong jihe yiqun fouren wo de qishi zhe, tamen jiang pailie zhengqi [dengdai gan wang shenpan de].
Deng tamen daoda [shenpan de] shi, ta [an la] shuo:“Nimen weihe hai meiyou wanquan lijie wo de qishi jiu fouren ne? Nimen hai zuole shenme?”
Youyu tamen xing bu yi, tamen bi shou xingfa de panjue, tamen jiang ya kou wu yan [buneng bianhu].
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Wo shi heiye gong tamen xiuxi, shi baizhou chengwei mingliang de [gong tamen mousheng]. Dui xinyang de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Zai na ri, haojiao yi chui xiang, chu an la yiyu [zhu][shemian] zhe wai, tiandi jian de yiqie dou jiang gandao kongbu, dou jiang qiangong de lai jian ta [an la].
Ni kanjian qun shan, ni yiwei tamen hen jiangu, qishi tamen jiang xiang yun yiyang xiaoshi. Na shi shi wanwu wanmei de an la suo zuo de. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, ta que shi che zhi de.
Shei zuo yi jian shangong, shei jiang huode bi na shangong geng hao de shan bao [zhu]. Zai na ri, tamen jiang mian shou kongbu.
Shei gan yi jian e xing, tamen jiang fuwozhe bei reng ru huo yu li.[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen zhi shou nimen suo fanzui e de huan bao.”

[Ni shuo]:“Wo [mu sheng] zhi fengming chongbai zhe zuo chengshi [mai jia] de zhu [an la], ta yi ba gai cheng ding wei jindi [zhu][huo shengjie zhi di]. Wanshi dou gui ta zhangguan. Wo yi fengming zuo guishun zhe [musilin],
bing [fengming xiang renlei] xuandu “gulanjing”.” Shei zunxing zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei mi wu,[shei zi shou qi hai]. Ni [yingdui zhe zhong ren] shuo:“Wo zhishi yige jinggao zhe.”
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la. Ta jiang zhaoshi nimen ta de jixiang, nimen jiang renshi zhexie jixiang. Ni de zhu jue bu hushi nimen suo zuo de.”
Ta, xi, mi mu [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhexie shi mingbai [chanming wanshi wanwu] de jingdian [“gulanjing”] de jing wen.
Weile xinyang de minzhong, wo yi zhenli [rushi] xiang ni [mu sheng] xushu mu sa he falao de gushi.

Falao dique ceng zai guonei aoman wudu. Ta ba guomin fencheng xuduo paibie [dengji], yapo qizhong yipai [ru yiselie de houyi], shahai tamen de nanhai, er rang tamen de nuhai huozhe. Ta que shi zuo'eduoduan di.
Wo yao ba enhui shi yu zai da dishang shou qiya zhe, wo yao shi tamen chengwei tongzhi zhe he jicheng zhe.
Wo yao shi tamen zai da dishang deshi, wo yao rang falao, ha man he ta lia de jundui kanjian tamen suo weiju de.

Wo ceng qishi mu sa de muqin:“Ni dang buru ta [mu sa]. Dang ni pa ta shoudao shanghai shi, ni jiu ba ta reng dao he li. Ni buyao haipa, buyao youchou. Wo yiding hui ba ta song hai ni, wo yiding hui renming ta wei shizhe.”
Suihou, falao de jiaren [cong he li] lao qile ta [mu sa], yizhi ta chengle tamen de diren he youhuan [zhi yuan]. Falao, ha man he ta lia de jundui que shi youzui de.

Falao de qizi [zhu] shuo:“[Ta] shi wo he ni de anwei. Nimen buke shahai ta, yexu [youzhaoyiri] ta hui dui women youyi, huozhe women keyi shou ta wei yi zi.”[Na shi] tamen bing wei chajue [shijian de zhenxiang].
Mu sa de muqin de xin bian de kong xu [zheng ri sinian mu sa]. Yao bushi wo shi ta de xin anding xialai, yibian ta chengwei xinshi, ta jihu baolu shiqingle.
Ta dui ta [mu sa] de jiejie shuo:“Ni genzhe ta [mu sa].” Suoyi, ta [mu sa de jiejie] jiu cong yuan chu kuishizhe ta, er tamen [diren] bing wei chajue.
Ciqian, wo yi jinzhi ta chi ge rumu de nai [zhu],[zhidao ta de jiejie lai]. Ta shuo:“Yao wo wei nimen jieshao yijia ren ti nimen buyang ta he hen hao zhaogu ta ma?”
Yushi wo you ba ta song hai ta de muqin, yibian ta huode anwei, bu zai youchou [zhu]; yibian ta zhidao, an la de nuoyan que shi zhenshi de, dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Dang ta [mu sa] zhang dao chengnian [zhu] bing neng zili shi, wo ci gei ta zhihui [sheng pin] he [zongjiao] zhishi. Wo ruci baochou xingshan zhe.

[You yitian], cheng li ren shuhu shi, ta jinru cheng li. Ta zai cheng li faxian liang geren zhengzai sida [zhu], yige shi ta de zuren [yiselie de houyi], ling yige shi ta de diren. Ta di nage zuren yaoqiu ta bangmang duifu ta di nage diren, yushi mu sa bian dale na ren yi quan, na ren jiu bei da sile. Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Zhe shi emo de xingwei, emo que shi yin ren mi wu de gongkai de diren.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo dique shi ziji shou sunle, qiu ni kuanshu wo ba!” Yinci, ta [an la] kuanshule ta [mu sa]. Ta que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Ni yi shi en gei wo, wo jue bu hui zai zuo fanzui zhe de bangshou.”
Di er tian zaochen, ta zai cheng li weiju de jingtizhe. Turan, zuotian qiu ta bangmang di nageren you xiang ta gao sheng qiujiu. Mu sa dui ta shuo:“Ni que shi mingxian de mi wu zhe.”

Dang ta yao gongji ta lia di nage diren shi, na ren shuo:“Mu sa a! Nandao ni yao xiang zuotian sha si nage ren yiyang sha si wo ma? Nandao ni zhi xiang zuo zhe difang de qiangbao zhe er buxiang zuo tiaojie ren ma?”
[Ci shi] you ge ren cong chengshi de yuanfang pao lai shuo:“Mu sa a! Shoulingmen zhengzai shangyi yao sha si ni, ni gankuai taozou ba! Wo zhenxin zhonggao ni.”
Ta [mashang] weiju jingti de taoli gai cheng. Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhengjiu wo tuo li bu yi de minzhong.”
Dang ta [mu sa] lai dao ma de ya ren [de guotu chu] shi, ta shuo:“Yexu wo de zhu hui yindao wo zou zhengdao.”

Dang ta lai dao ma de ya ren de quanshui pang shi, ta faxian yiqun ren zhengzai gei tamen de yang qun yinshui, hai faxian liang ge nu qingnian zhengzai zulan ta lia de yang qun. Ta shuo:“Ni lia zenme la?” Ta lia shuo:“Women yao dengdao muyang ren ba tamen de yang qun gan zou hou, caineng gei women de yang qun yinshui. Women de fuqin shi yi wei nianmai de laoren.”
Yushi ta bian wei ta lia er shi ta lia de yang qun yinshui, ranhou, ta tui dao yige yinliang chu. Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Buguan ni jiang gei wo shenme enhui, wo du xuyao.”

Na liang ge nu qingnian zhong de yige mian tian di xiang ta zou lai shuo:“Wo de fuqin xiang qing ni qu, yibian ta baochang ni wei women er shi women de yang qun yinshui.” Dang ta [mu sa] jian dao ta [ta lia de fuqin] bing xiang ta xushu ziji de gushi shi, ta [ta lia de fuqin] shuo:“Ni [mu sa] buyao haipa, ni yijing tao li liao bu yi de minzhong.”
Na liang ge nu qingnian zhong de yige shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Qing ni guyong ta ba! Ta shi ni suo neng guyong dao de zui hao de ren, ta qiangzhuang er chengshi.”

Ta [dui mu sa] shuo:“Wo dasuan ba wo de zhe liang ge nu'er zhong de yige jia gei ni, qi tiaojian shi ni wei wo zuo ba nian huo. Jiaru ni zuo man shi nian, na shi ni ziyuan zuo haoshi, wo buxiang weinan ni. Jiaru an la yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi shanren.”
Ta [mu sa] shuo:“Zhe shi ni wo suo ding de hetong [zhu], wulun wo zuo man liang ge qixian de nage, dui wo du shi gongping de. An la jianzheng women suo shuo de.”

Dang mu sa wancheng qixian bing daizhe jiaren luxing shi, ta kanjian shan na bian you ge huoguang. Ta dui ta de jiaren shuo:“Nimen ting yixia, wo dique kanjian yige huoguang, yexu wo keyi cong nali gei nimen dai hui yixie xiaoxi lai, huo dai hui yige huoba lai gong nimen qunuan.”
Dang ta daoda huoguang chu shi, you ge shengyin cong shangu de youbian, bei ci fu zhi di di na ke shu pang han dao:“Mu sa a! Wo jiushi an la, shi zhong shijie de zhu [zhu].

Ni reng xia ni de shouzhang ba!” Dang ta kanjian na shouzhang xiang she yiyang wan yan yidong shi, ta jiu zhuanshen taopao er bu gan huigu.[You hua sheng shuo]:“Mu sa a! Ni guolai! Ni buyao haipa, ni que shi anquan de.

Ni bashou charu huai zhong, ni chouchu shi jiang bian cheng jiebai yaoyan de, meiyou renhe shanghai. Ni bashou suo huiqu ba! Miande haipa. Zhe liang zhong jixiang shi ni de zhu xianshi gei falao ji qi shoulingmen de zhengju, tamen que shi beini de minzhong.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo ceng shaguo tamen [falao de renmin] zhong de yiren, wo pa tamen hui shahai wo.
Wo di gege ha lun, ta bi wo geng shanyu ciling, qiu ni pai ta tong wo yiqi qu, zuo wo de zhushou, fuzhu zhichi wo. Wo dique pa tamen hui fouren wo.”

Ta [an la] shuo:“Wo jiang yong ni di gege lai zhu ni yibizhili, wo jiang ci gei ni lia quanli, yinci, tamen buneng shanghai ni lia. Ni lia he zhuisui ni lia de ren jiang ping wo de jixiang huode shengli [zhu].”
Dang mu sa daizhe wo de mingbai de jixiang jian dao tamen [falao de renmin] shi, tamen shuo:“Zhe zhishi niezao de moshu, women cong meiyou tingjian zai women de zuxian shidai you zhe zhong shi.”
Mu sa shuo:“Wo de zhu zui zhidao, shei huode ta ciyu de zhengdao, shei bian huode houshi de shan guo. Bu yi zhe shi jue bu hui chenggong de.”

Falao shuo:“Zhong qing a! Chu wo wai, wo bu zhidao nimen hai you she me ke gong chongbai de zhuzai. Ha man a! Ni wei wo shao zhuan ba! Ranhou ni wei wo jianzao yizuo gao ta ba! Yibian wo neng kuijian mu sa de zhu, jinguan wo renwei ta kending shi shuohuang zhe.”
Ta he ta de jundui zai guonei guoyu wangzizunda, tamen renwei tamen jue bu hui gui dao wo zheli lai.
Suoyi wo chengzhile ta he ta de jundui, wo ba tamen reng ru haili [yan si]. Ni [mu sheng] dang guancha bu yi zhe de jieju ruhe!
Wo shi tamen chengwei zhao ren ru huo yu [zhu] de daitou ren. Fuhuo ri, tamen jiang de bu dao yuanzhu.
Zai jinshi, wo shi tamen chang zao qianze; fuhuo ri, tamen jiang shi mianmu chou'e de.
Zai wo huimiele yiqian de xuduo shidai hou, wo que yi ci gei mu sa jingdian, zuowei renlei de mingzheng, zhinan he ci min, yibian tamen jieshou jiaohui.
Dang wo shi mu sa mingbai mingling shi, ni [mu sheng] meiyou zai na shan de xi bian, ye meiyou zaichang.

[Zai mu sa zhihou], wo you chuangzaole xuduo shidai, naxie shidai jinglile manchang de suiyue. Ni [mu sheng] weiceng zai ma de ya ren zhong juzhuguo, xiang tamen songdu wo de qishi, er wo shi [jianchi jixu] paiqian shizhe de.

Dang wo zhaohuan [mu sa] shi, ni meiyou zai shan bian, er [paiqian ni] shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de enhui, yibian ni jinggao zai ni zhiqian meiyou renhe jinggao zhe daoda de minzhong, yibian tamen jieshou jiaohui.

Jiaru bushi zheyang [jiaru wo meiyou paiqian ni qu jiaohua mai jia ren], tamen bi yin ziji qinshou suo fan de zui'e er zaoshou zainan, tamen bi shuo:“Women de zhu a! Weisheme ni bu paiqian yi wei shizhe lai jiaohua women, rang women zunxing ni de qishi [“gulanjing”] er chengwei xinshi ne?”

Dan dang zhenli [mu sheng ji qi shiming] cong wo zheli jianglin tamen shi, tamen queshuo:“Weisheme ta meiyou shou ci xiang mu sa suo shou ci de [jixiang] ne?” Nandao tamen ciqian meiyou fourenguo mu sa suo shou ci de [jixiang] ma? Tamen shuo:“Zhe [“tao la te” he “gulanjing”] shi liang bu huxiang biaobang de moshu.” Tamen hai shuo:“Women yi bu jingdian ye bu xiangxin.”
Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe, name, nimen jiu na chu yi bu cong an la jiang shi de jingdian lai, zhiyao bi zhe liang bu geng neng yin ren yu zhengdao, wo jiu zunxing ta.”

Jiaru tamen buneng huida ni [ji bu xinyang yisilan jiao de jiaoyi jiaogui, ye bu zhuisui ni], name, ni dang zhidao, tamen zhishi shuncong ziji de siyu. Shei bi bu zunxing an la qishi de zhengdao er shuncong ziji de siyu zhe geng mi wu ne? An la jue bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.
Wo que yi wei tamen er fanfu jiang shi zhenyan [“gulanjing”], yibian tamen jieshou jiaohui.
Fan ci [“gulanjing” jiang shi] qian meng wo ciyu jingdian [ru “tao la te” he “yin ji lei”] zhe, tamen shi quexin zhenyan [“gulanjing”] de.

Dang youren xiang tamen songdu zhenyan [“gulanjing”] shi, tamen jiu shuo:“Women quexinle, zhe que shi cong women de zhu jiang shi de zhenli, women ciqian jiushi musilinle [ru abu du la•ben•se lia mu deng].”
Youyu zhexie ren jianren, yidebaoyuan, shishe wo suo ci gei tamen de caiwu, tamen jiang huode shuang bei de baochou.
Dang tamen tingjian wang tan shi, tamen bian likai bing shuo:“Women dui women de xingwei fuze, nimen ye yingdui nimen de xingwei fuze. Zhu nimen ping'an! Women bu yu yuren xiangchu.”
Ni jue buneng shi ni suo xihuan de ren zunxing zhengdao, dan an la neng shi tasuo yiyu de ren zunxing zhengdao [zhu]. Ta zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao zhe.

Tamen shuo:“Jiaru women yu ni yiqi zunxing zhengdao, women jiang bei quzhu chujing.” Nandao wo meiyou wei tamen shezhi yige anquan de jindi [mai jia] bing shi ge zhong shuiguo yun dao nali, zuowei wo ciyu de jiyang ma? Dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.

Wo ceng huimiele xuduo chengshi [de renmin], naxie chengshi de renmin hui xiangshou er bu hui gan'en [weikang an la ji qi shizhemen]. Zhexie shi tamen de jusuo, zai tamen bei huimie hou, hen shao youren juzhu. Wo que shi [tamen de] jicheng zhe.

Ni de zhu zai paiqian shizhe qu jiaohua chengshi de renmin bing xiang tamen xuandu wo de qishi qian, jue bu hui huimie naxie chengshi. Chufei naxie chengshi de renmin xing bu yi, fouze, wo jue bu hui huimie naxie chengshi.
Fanshi nimen suo shou ci de [enhui], zhishi jinshi shenghuo [zhanshi] de xiangshou he zhuangshi,[houshi] zai an la nali de cai shi zui hao de, zui chijiu de. Nandao nimen buming li ma?

Huode wo di meihao xunuo [leyuan] bing faxian shi zhenshi de ren, yu zai jinshi shenghuo zhong huode wo ciyu de jiyang [guo shechi shenghuo], er fuhuo ri bei dai qu shou [huo yu zhi] xing de ren shi yiyang de ma?
Zai na ri, ta [an la] jiang zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen suo wangyan de wo de huobanmen [xianzai] zai nali?”

Naxie shou xingfa panjue de ren jiang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zhexie ren shi women suo wudao de, women shi tamen mi wu, youru women shi ziji mi wu yiyang. Women xiang ni shenming: Women yu tamen hao wu guanxi, tamen meiyou chongbaiguo women.”

You hua sheng [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen qiqiu nimen [suo wangyan de an la] de huobanmen ba!” Yushi tamen bian qiqiu tamen [naxie huoban], dan tamen bu yingda tamen, er tamen kanjianle xingfa.[Tamen jiang huanxiang] yaoshi tamen ziji yuanlai zunxing zhengdao duo hao a!
Zai na ri, ta [an la] jiang zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen gei shizhemen de dafu shi shenme?”
Zai na ri, suoyou bian ci dou jiang dui tamen bian cheng mohu de, erqie tamen buneng huxiang xunwen.
Zhiyu [zai chenshi yi] huizui, xinyang bing xingshan zhe, yexu shi chenggong zhe.

Ni de zhu yu chuangzao shenme, jiu chuangzao shenme; yu xuanze shenme, jiu xuanze shenme, er tamen shi wu quan xuanze de. Zanmei an la chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Fanshi tamen xiongzhong suoyincang de he gongkai de, ni de zhu quan zhidao.
Ta shi an la, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu [zhu]. Zai jinshi he houshi de zansong quan gui ta. Yiqie panjue, quan gui ta zhangguan. Nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo [mu sheng] ba! Jiaru an la wei nimen er ba heiye yanchang dao fuhuo ri, name, chu an la wai, nage zhuzai hai neng ci gei nimen guangming ne? Nimen weihe bu tingcong ne?”

Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Jiaru an la wei nimen er ba baizhou yanchang dao fuhuo ri, name, chu an la wai, nage zhuzai hai neng ci gei nimen heiye, yi gong nimen xiuxi ne? Nimen weihe bu guancha ne?”
Zhe shi ta [an la] de enhui, ta wei nimen er chuangzao heiye he baizhou, yibian nimen zai heiye xiuxi [zhu],[zai baizhou] xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen gan'en.
Zai na ri, ta [an la] jiang zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen suo wangyan de wo de huobanmen [xianzai] zai nali?”

Wo jiang cong mei ge minzu zhong xuan chu yige zhengren bing [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen na chu nimen de zhengju lai ba!” Ci shi tamen cai zhidao zhenli dou shi an la de. Tamen suo niezao de shiqing paoqi tamen xiaoshile.

Gao lun que shi mu sa de zuren, dan ta [gao lun] nuedai tamen. Wo ceng ci gei ta [gao lun] xuduo caibao, yizhi naxie caibao de yaoshi keyi yadao yiqun qiangzhuang de ren. Dangshi, ta de zuren dui ta shuo:“Ni buyao [gu en er] deyiwangxing. An la jue bu xihuan deyiwangxing zhe.

Ni dang jie an la ciyu ni de caifu qu xunqiu houshi de zhuzhai, dan ni buyao wangji ni zai jinshi de hefa xiangshou. Ni dang xingshan, youru an la shandai ni yiyang. Ni buyao zai dadishang zuo'e. An la jue bu xihuan zuo'e zhe.”

Ta [gao lun] shuo:“Wo zhi suo yi shou ci zhexie caibao, jie yin wo you zhishi.” Nandao ta bu zhidao ma? Zai ta zhiqian, an la que yi huimiele xuduo shidai, naxie shidai de shili bi ta de geng qiangda, jixu de caifu bi ta de geng duo. Fanzui zhe de zui'e shi wuxu shenwen de.
Ta [gao lun] ceng shengzhuang chulai jian ta de zuren. Naxie tan ai jinshi shenghuo de ren shuo:“Yaoshi women ye huode gao lun suo shou ci de caifu duo hao a! Ta que shi you dafu de ren.”

Naxie shou ci [zongjiao] zhishi de ren shuo:“Nimen zhen buxing! An la [zai houshi] dui xinyang bing xingshan zhe de baochou cai shi zui hao de. Wei jianren zhe [zunxing zhengdao zhe] caineng huode na zhong baochou.”
Wo shi dadi tunmole ta he ta de zhuzhai [zhu]. Meiyou renhe tuanti neng bangzhu ta diyu an la de chengfa, ta ye buneng zijiu.

Naxie zuotian hai xianmu ta [gao lun] de jingkuang de ren kaishi shuo:“Ni bu zhidao ma? An la yu shi ta de puren zhong shei fuyu, jiu shi shei fuyu; yu shi shei jiongpo, jiu shi shei jiongpo. Jiaru an la bu shi en gei women, ta bi shi da di tunmo womenle. Ni bu zhidao ma? Bu xinyang zhe shi jue bu hui chenggong de.”
Zhe shi houshi de zhuzhai [leyuan], wo jiang ba ta ci yu bu yuan zai da dishang aoman beili zhenli he bu yuan zuo'e zhe. Shan guo shi shuyu jingwei zhe de.
Shei xingshan, shei jiang huode bi na shangong [zhu 1] geng hao de shan bao; shei zuo'e, shei zhi shou suo zuo e xing de [tongyang] huan bao [zhu 2].
Ta [an la] jiang shi ni [mu sheng]“gulanjing”, ta bi jiang shi ni fu fan guxiang [leyuan]. Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu zui zhidao shei shi zunxing zhengdao de, shei shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong de.”
Ni weiceng xiwang ta [an la] ba zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] jiang gei ni, dan zhe [“gulanjing”] shi cong ni de zhu jiang shi de enhui, suoyi, ni jue buyao zuo bu xinyang zhe de bangshou.
Zai an la de qishi jiang gei ni zhihou, jue buyao rang tamen [bu xinyang zhe] fang'ai ni xuanchuan naxie qishi. Ni dang zhaohuan renmen gui xin ni de zhu, ni buyao zuo bai ouxiang zhe.

Ni buyao ji qiqiu an la, you qiqiu qita shenling. Chu ta [an la] wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Chu ta de benti wai, wanwu dou jiang huimie. Yiqie panjue, quan gui ta zhangguan. Nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.
Ai lifu, lia mu, mi mu [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Nandao ren men yiwei zhiyao shuo:“Women xinyangle”, tamen jiu bu shou kaoyanle ma [zhu]?
Wo que yi kaoyanguo tamen de qian ren. An la dique zhidao shuo shihua de ren, ye dique zhidao shuohuang hua de ren.
Nandao zuo'e zhe yiwei tamen neng taotuo wo de chengfa ma? Tamen suo panduan de zhen elie!
Shei xiwang yu an la xiang hui,[shei dang zhidao] an la de qixian kending shi yao lailin de. Ta shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.
Shei [wei an la zhidao] fendou [zhu], shei zi shou qi yi. An la que shi wu qiu yu zhong shijie de.
Fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, wo bi jiang shemian tamen de zuiguo, bi jiang yi tamen suozuo de zui hao shangong baochou tamen [zhu].

Wo yi ming ren dang xiaojing fumu [zhu]. Dan jiaru ta lia qiangpo ni yong ni suo bu zhidao de pei wu gei wo shezhi huoban, name, ni jiu buyao fucong ta lia. Nimen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai, wo jiang ba nimen cengjing suo zuo de gaosu nimen.
Fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, wo bi jiang shi tamen [zai leyuan li] jinru shanren zhi lie.

Renmen zhong youren shuo:“Women xinyang an lale.” Dan jiaru ta wei an la zhidao er shou shanghai, ta jiu ba renmen de shanghai dang zuo an la de xingfa. Jiaru shengli cong ni de zhu jianglin, tamen [wei xinzhe] bi shuo:“Women que shi tong nimen zai yiqi de.” Nandao an la bushi zui zhidao ren lei xiongzhong de yiqie ma?
An la dique zhidao [naxie shi] xinshi, dique zhidao [naxie shi] wei xinzhe.
Bu xinyang de renmen dui xinshimen shuo:“Nimen zunxing women de dao ba! Women yiding fudan nimen de zuiguo.” Qishi, tamen jue buneng fudan tamen de renhe zuiguo. Tamen que shi shuohuang zhe.
Tamen bi jiang fudan tamen [ziji] de zhongzui, yiji tamen [ziji] de zhongzui zhi wai de qita zhongzui. Fuhuo ri, tamen bi jiang bei shenwen tamen suo niezao de huangyan [zhu].

Wo que yi paiqian nu ha qu jiaohua ta de zuren, ta zai tamen zhong shenghuole jiubai wushi nian [ta zhaohuan tamen xinyang du yi de an la, paoqi ouxiang chongbai deng].[Zuihou] hongshui zai tamen xing bu yi shi xijile tamen.
Wo zhengjiule ta he yu ta tongchuan zhe, wo shi na sou chuan chengwei zhong shijie de yige jianjie.
[Wo que yi paiqian] yi bu la xin. Dangshi, ta dui ta de zuren shuo:“Nimen dang chongbai an la, dang jingwei ta, zhe dui nimen shi zui hao de, jiaru nimen zhi dao.

Nimen she an la er chongbai ouxiang, bing niezao huangyan. Qishi, nimen she an la er chongbai de ouxiang jue buneng ci gei nimen renhe jiyang. Suoyi, nimen dang xiang an la xunqiu jiyang, dang chongbai ta, dang ganxie ta. Nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.
Jiaru nimen fouren [wo], name, zai nimen zhiqian you xuduo minzu que yi fourenguo [tamen de shizhe]. Shizhe de zeren zhishi mingbai di chuanda [qishi].”
Nandao tamen bu zhi dao an la zenyang chuangzao wanwu, ranhou hai jiang zai chuangzao [fuhuo] ma? Zhe dui an la que shi rongyi de.
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen dang zai da dishang luxing [zhu], guancha an la zenyang chuangzao wanwu. Ranhou an la hai jiang zai chuangzao [fuhuo]. An la dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.
Ta [an la] yu chengfa shei, jiu chengfa shei; yu ci min shei, jiu ci min shei [zhu]. Nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.
Wulun nimen shi zai dishang, haishi zai tianshang, dou buneng taotuo [an la de chengfa]. Chu an la wai, nimen jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.”
Bu xinyang an la de qishi he [houshi] yu ta xiang hui de renmen, zhexie ren dui wo de enhui juewangle, zhexie ren bi shou tongku de xingfa.
Ta de zuren suo zuo de weiyi dafu zhishi shuo:“Nimen sha si ta ba! Huo shao si ta ba!” Dan an la zhengjiu ta mian shou huoxing. Dui xinyang de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Nimen she an la er chongbai ouxiang, zhi weile nimen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong de huxiang qin'ai eryi. Ranhou, fuhuo ri, nimen jiang huxiang fouren, huxiang zhouma. Nimen de guisu shi huo yu, nimen jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.”
Lu te xiangxin ta [ji xiangxin yi bu la xin de shiming]. Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Wo jiang wei wo de zhu [de dao er] qianyi [zhu]. Ta que shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.”

Wo ciyu ta [yi bu la xin] yi si ha ge he ya gubu, bing ciyu ta de houyi sheng pin he jingdian [ru jiang gei mu sa de “tao la te”, jiang gei er sa de “yin ji lei”, jiang gei mu sheng de “gulanjing”]. Wo zai jinshi ciyu ta baochou, ta zai houshi bi zai shanren zhi lie.
[Wo que yi paiqian] lu te. Dangshi, ta dui ta de zuren shuo:“Xuzhi, nimen suozuo de choushi [tongxinglian], zai nimen zhiqian, zai zhong shijie cong wei youren zuoguo.

Nandao nimen zhen de yao [she nuren er] yu nanren manzu xingyu [tongxinglian], lanlu [zhu 1] qiangjie [zhu 2][luxing zhe], shenzhi zai nimen de juhui zhong ye yang e ma?” Dan ta de zuren suo zuo de weiyi dafu zhishi shuo:“Ni ba an la de xingfa jiang gei women ba! Jiaru ni shi chengshi zhe.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni yuanzhu wo zhansheng zuo'e de minzhong.”

Dang wo de shizhemen [tianshi] daizhe jiayin jian dao yi bu la xin shi, tamen [tianshi] shuo:“Women yiding yao huimie [lu te shengren suozai de] zhege chengshi [balesitan de suo duo ma cheng] de renmin, yinwei zhege chengshi de renmin que shi bu yi zhe.”

Ta [yi bu la xin] shuo:“Dan lu te ye zai cheng li.” Tamen shuo:“Women feichang qingchu shei zai cheng li, women yiding yao zhengjiu ta [lu te] he ta de jiaren, dan ta de qizi chuwai, ta shi shuyu liu zai houmian [bei huimie] zhe.”

Dang wo de shizhemen [tianshi] jian dao lu te shi, ta wei tamen [tianshi] youchou, bing gandao nanyu baohu tamen. Tamen [tianshi] shuo:“Ni buyao haipa, ni buyao youchou, women yiding yao zhengjiu ni he ni de jiaren, dan ni de qizi chuwai, ta shi shuyu liu zai houmian [bei huimie] zhe.
Women yiding yao cong tianshang jiang tianzai [zhu] lai chengfa zhege chengshi de renmin, yinwei tamen weikang [an la zhi ming].”
Wo que yi wei mingli de minzhong er ba ci cheng [sihai] liu zuo yi zhong mingxian de jianjie.

[Wo que yi] xiang ma de ya ren paiqianle tamen de xiongdi shu abu. Ta shuo:“Wo de zuren a! Nimen dang chongbai an la, dang panwang [chongbai an la zai] mori [de shan bao]. Nimen buyao zai dadishang weifeizuodai.”
Dan tamen fouren ta, yinci, da dizhen xijile tamen, qingchen, tamen pazhe si zai ziji de jiazhong.

[Wo ceng huimiele] a de ren he sa mu de ren. Cong tamen de jusuo [de feixu] zhong, nimen ke qingxi kanjian [tamen] bei huimie de qingxing. Emo yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, bing fang'ai tamen zunxing zhengdao, jinguan tamen yuanlai shi mingli de.
[Wo ceng huimiele] gao lun, falao he ha man. Mu sa que yi daizhe mingzheng daoda tamen, dan tamen reng zai guonei aoman wudu, tamen wei neng taotuo [wo de xingfa].

Wo yi mei geren de zui'e chengfa mei geren, tamen zhong youxie ren, wo ceng jiang feishazoushi de fengbao chengfaguo [ru lu te de renmin]; youxie ren ceng zao kongbu zhi sheng de xiji [ru sa mu de ren huo shu abu de renmin]; youxie ren, wo ceng shi da di tunmo tamen [ru gao lun]; youxie ren, wo ceng ba tamen yan si [ru falao de renmin]. An la wei kuidai tamen, er shi tamen shi ziji shou sun.
Naxie she an la er ling qiu baohu zhe de ren de biyu, youru zhizhu zao wu yiyang. Zui cuiruo de fangwu que shi zhizhu de fangwu [ji zhizhu wang], dan yuan tamen zhidao!
Fanshi tamen she an la er qidao de, ta [an la] quan zhidao. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.
Zhexie biyu shi wo wei renlei shezhi de, wei xuezhemen caineng lijie ta.
[An la dui mu sheng shuo]:“An la yi zhenli chuangzao tiandi.” Dui xinshimen, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.

Ni [mu sheng] dang xuandu yi qishi ni de jingdian [“gulanjing”], dang jin shou bai gong [zhu 1], yinwei bai gong dique neng zuzhi gan choushi he zui'e. An la [zai tianshimen mianqian] zanyang ni dique [bi ni zai bai zhong zansong ta] geng zhongda [zhu 2]. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la quan zhidao.

Nimen ying yi zui hao de fangshi [yong liangyan quan tamen gui xin'an la] yu you jing ren [youtai jiaotu he jidu jiaotu] bianlun [zhu], tamen zhong de bu yi zhe chuwai. Nimen ying [dui tamen] shuo:“Women xinyang jiang shi women de jingdian [“gulanjing”], ye xinyang jiang shi nimen de jingdian, women suo chongbai de zhu he nimen suo chongbai de zhu shi tong yige zhu [an la], women yi guishun ta.”

Wo ruci ba zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] jiang gei ni [mu sheng]. Fan meng wo ciyu jingdian [ru “tao la te” he “yin ji lei”] zhe, you xinyang de,[xianzai] zhexie ren zhong yeyou xinyang de, wei bu xinyang zhe cai hui fouren wo de qishi.
Zai ci [“gulanjing” jiang shi] zhiqian, ni ji bu hui dushu, ye bu hui yong youshou xiezi, fouze, mixin xuwang zhe biding huaiyile.

Qishi, zai shou ci zhishi zhe [you jing ren] de xinzhong, zhe [“tao la te” he “yin ji lei” zhong dui mu sheng jiang jiang shi de yuyan] que shi mingxian de jixiang, wei bu yi zhe cai hui fouren wo de jixiang.
Tamen shuo:“Weisheme meiyouyixie jixiang cong ta [mu sheng] de zhu jiang gei ta ne?” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Jixiang dou zai an la nali, wo zhishi yi wei tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Wo que yi jiang shi ni chang xiang tamen xuandu de jingdian [zhu][“gulanjing”], nandao zhe dui tamen hai bugou ma? Dui xinyang de minzhong, ci zhong que you yi zhong enhui he jiaohui.
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“An la zuyi zuo wo yu nimen zhi jian de jianzheng zhe. Ta zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie. Fan mixin xuwang [ouxiang] er bu xinyang an la zhe, zhexie ren que shi sunshi zhe.”
Tamen yaoqiu ni [mu sheng] zaori shixian [dui tamen de] xingfa, jiaru meiyou yige dingqi, xingfa biding jianglin tamenle. Xingfa bi jiang zai tamen buzhi bu jue shi turan jianglin tamen.
Tamen yaoqiu ni zaori shixian [dui tamen de] xingfa. Huo yu bi jiang baowei zhu bu xinyang zhe.
Zai na ri,[huo yu de] xingfa jiang cong tamen de tou shang he jiaoxia longzhaozhe tamen, ta [an la] jiang shuo:“Nimen changshi nimen suo zuo de eguo ba!”
Wo de xinyang de purenmen a! Wo de dadi que shi kuankuo de, nimen zhi neng chongbai wo [zhu].
Mei ren dou jiang changshi siwang de ziwei, zuihou, nimen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai [zhu].
Fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, wo bi shi tamen juzhu zai leyuan de gaolou zhong, zhu he cong xiamian liuguo, yong ju qizhong. Xingshan zhe de baochou duo mei a!
Tamen [xingshan zhe] shi jianren de, tamen zhi xinlai tamen de zhu [an la].
You duoshao dongwu buneng fudan ziji de jiyang! Shi an la ciyu tamen jiyang, ye ciyu nimen [zhu]. Ta shi quan wen de, quanzhi de.
Jiaru ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi bing shi ri yue [wei nimen] fuwu?” Tamen bi shuo:“An la.” Tamen weihe hai yao beili zhenli ne?
An la yu shi ta de pu ren zhong shei fuyu, jiu shi shei fuyu; yu shi shei jiongpo, jiu shi shei jiongpo. An la que shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
Jiaru ni wen tamen:“Shei cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shi kusi de dadi fusu ne?” Tamen bi shuo:“An la.” Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la.” Dan tamen da duoshu ren bing buming li.
Jinshi shenghuo zhishi yi zhong yule he youxi, houshi de zhuzhai [shenghuo] cai shi zhenzheng de shenghuo [zhu]. Dan yuan tamen zhidao!
Dang tamen cheng chuan shi, tamen jiu qiancheng de qiqiu an la; dang ta shi tamen ping'an denglu shi, tamen mashang jiu chongbai ouxiangle,
yizhi tamen gufule wo suo ciyu tamen de enhui. Rang tamen [zhanshi] xiangle ba! Tamen bujiu jiang zhidao [huihen].
Nandao tamen bu zhidao wo shi [mai jia] chengwei yige ping'an di jindi, er tamen sizhou de ren que zao lueduo ma? Nandao tamen hai yao mixin xuwang [ouxiang] er fouren an la de enhui ma?
Shei bi jie an la de mingyi niezao huangyan, huo fouren yi jianglin ta de zhenli [zhu][mu sheng yu “gulanjing”] zhe geng bu yi ne? Nandao huo yu li meiyou bu xinyang zhe de zhusuo ma?
Fan wei wo de dao fendou zhe, wo bi yindao tamen zunxing wo de dao [yisilan jiao]. An la dique yu xingshan zhe tong zai.
Ai lifu, lia mu, mi mu [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].

Luoma ren zai linjin di difang [xuliya, yilake, yuedan he balesitan] zhanbaile. Tamen zhanbai hou, tamen jiang zai ji niannei huode shengli. Yiqian [bosi ren dabai luoma ren] he yihou [luoma ren dabai bosi ren] de shiwu, jun you an la panding. Zai na ri, xinshimen jiang yin an la de yuanzhu er xinxi. Ta yuanzhu tasuo yiyu zhe. Ta shi quanneng de, te ci de.
[Zhe shi] an la de xu yue [an la rang luoma ren zhansheng bosi ren]. An la shi jue bu shuangyue de, dan da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Tamen zhi zhidao jinshi shenghuo de waibu qingkuang, tamen dique huluele houshi.

Nandao tamen meiyou shensi ziji ma [an la zenyang cong wu dao you chuangzao tamen bing jiang zai si hou fuhuo tamen]? An la zhi yi zhenli he dingqi chuangzao tiandi wanwu, dan you xuduo ren dique bu xiangxin [houshi] jiang yu tamen de zhu xiang hui.

Nandao tamen meiyou zai dadishang luxing, guancha tamen qian ren de jieju ruhe ma? Qian ren de shili bi tamen de geng qiangda, gengdi he renkou bi tamen de geng duo, tamen de shizhemen yi daizhe mingzheng daoda tamen. An la wei kuidai tamen, er shi tamen shi ziji shou sun.
Ranhou, zuo'e zhe de jieju bian shi zao e bao, yinwei tamen fouren an la de qishi bing jiayi chaoxiao.
An la chuangzao wanwu, ranhou hai jiang zai chuangzao [fuhuo], zuihou, nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.
Fuhuo de shijian lailin zhi ri, fanzui zhe jiang shi juewang de.
Zai tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang zhong, jiang meiyou qiuqing zhe [ti tamen qiuqing],[na shi] tamen jiang fouren tamen suo chongbaiguo de ouxiang.
Fuhuo de shijian lailin zhi ri, zai na ri, tamen [xinshi he bu xinyang zhe] jiang bei fenkai.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, tamen jiang zai leyuan li xiangshou yongjiu de kuaile [zhu].
Zhiyu bu xinyang, fouren wo de jixiang he houshi [yu wo] xiang hui zhe, zhexie ren jiang bei dai qu shou [huo yu zhi] xing.
[Xinshimen a!] Nimen dang zai wanshang [hun li he xiao li] he zaochen [chen li] zansong an la.
Tiandi jian de zansong, yiji [nimen] bangwan [bu li] he wuhou [shang li] de zansong quan gui ta [zhu][mei ri wu ci libai ding wei zhuming].
Ta cong wu shengwu zhong chansheng you shengwu, cong you shengwu zhong chansheng wu shengwu. Ta shi kusi de dadi fusu, nimen ye jiang ruci bei fuhuo.
Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Ta yong nitu chuangzao nimen [ru a dan], ranhou, nimen like chengwei renlei, sanbu ge fang.
Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Ta cong nimen ziji zhong wei nimen chuangzao pei'ou, yibian nimen yilian tamen, bing shi nimen hu ai hu lian. Dui neng sikao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Tiandi de chuangzao, nimen yuyan [zhu] yu fuse de chayi. Dui xuezhemen, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Nimen zai heiye he baizhou de shuimian ji xunqiu ta de enhui. Dui neng tingcong [quangao] de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Ta shi nimen zai kongju he xiwang zhong kanjian dianguang, bing cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shi kusi de da di fusu. Dui neng mingli de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Tiandi feng ta de mingling er wending. Ranhou, dang ta zhaohuan nimen yisheng, nimen like cong di li [fenmu li] chulai [shoushen].
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi ta [an la] de, yiqie dou fucong ta.

Shi ta chuangzao wanwu, ranhou hai jiang zai chuangzao [fuhuo], zhe dui ta shi feichang rongyi de. Tiandi jian zuigao de shuxing [ru chu an la wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu, an la wuyulunbi] quan gui ta. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.

Ta yi nimen ziji wei nimen she ge biyu: Nandao nimen yunxu nimen suo yongyou de nuli tong nimen yiqi fenxiang wo suo ciyu nimen de caifu, yizhi nimen bici pingdeng, nimen weiju tamen, youru nimen weiju nimen ziji ren ma? Wo ruci wei neng mingli de minzhong chanming xuduo jixiang.
Qishi, bu yi zhe zai wuzhi di shuncong ziji de siyu. An la shi qi mi wu zhe, shei hai neng yindao tamen ne? Tamen jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.

Ni [mu sheng] dang qiancheng chedi gui xin zhengjiao [yisilan jiao], an la yi zhengjiao chuangzao renlei. An la de zhengjiao shi buneng gaibian de. Zhe jiushi zhengjiao [zhu], dan da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Nimen dang chang xiang ta [an la] huizui, dang jingwei ta, dang jin shou bai gong. Nimen buyao zuo bai ouxiang zhe.
Tamen [bai ouxiang zhe] ba ziji de zongjiao fenlie cheng zongpai, mei pai dou wei ziji suo yongyou de jiaoyi er zhanzhanzixi.

Dang renmen zaoyu buxing shi, tamen bian qiancheng qiqiu tamen de zhu [an la] bing xiang ta huizui; dan dang ta shi tamen changshi ta de enhui shi, tamen zhong youxie ren mashang jiu gei tamen de zhu [an la] shezhi huoban,
yizhi tamen gufule wo suo ciyu tamen de enhui. Nimen [zhanshi] xiangle ba! Nimen bujiu jiang zhidao [huihen].
Nandao wo ceng jiang shi tamen jingdian, ti dao tamen keyi gei ta [an la] shezhi huoban ma?
Dang wo shi renmen changshi enhui shi, tamen bian wei ci er xinxi; dan dang tamen yin ziji qinshou suo fan de zui'e er zaoyu buxing shi, tamen mashang jiu juewangle.
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? An la yu shi shei fuyu, jiu shi shei fuyu; yu shi shei jiongpo, jiu shi shei jiongpo. Dui xinyang de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
Ni dang ba qinqi, pinmin he luxing zhe ying de de shi gei tamen, dui xiang xunqiu an la de xiyue zhe, zhe shi zui hao de, zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe.

Nimen ba fangzhai er huode de lixi fen gei bieren, yiqi zengjia bieren de caifu, zai an la kan lai bing wei zengjia; dan nimen wei xunqiu an la de xiyue er jiaona de tian ke,[zai an la kan lai], zhexie ren bi jiang huode duo bei de baochou.

Shi an la chuangzao nimen, ranhou gongji nimen [shiwu], ranhou you shi nimen siwang, zuihou [fuhuo ri] you ba nimen fuhuo. Nimen suo wangyan de [an la de] huoban zhong you shei neng zuo zhexie shiqing zhong de renhe yi jian ne? Zanmei ta [an la] chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Youyu renmen qinshou suo fan de zui'e, eguo yi xianxian yu ludi he haiyang, yibian ta [an la] shi tamen [zai jinshi] changshi yixie tamen suo fanzui e de chengfa, yibian tamen huiguo zi xin [zhu].
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen dang zai dadishang luxing, guancha qian ren de jieju ruhe! Tamen da duoshu ren shi bai ouxiang zhe.”
Zai buke kangju de rizi cong an la jianglin qian, ni [mu sheng] dang chedi gui xin zhengjiao [yisilan jiao]. Zai na ri, tamen [renlei] jiang bei fenkai [xinshi jin leyuan, bu xinyang zhe jin huo yu].
Shei bu xinyang, shei zi shou qi hai; shei xingshan, shei zhi wei ziji yubei [leyuan li] hao de guisu,
yibian ta [an la] yi ta de enhui baochou xinyang bing xingshan zhe. Ta jue bu xihuan bu xinyang zhe.

Ta de jixiang zhi yi shi: Ta paiqian feng [zai jiangyu qian] baoxi, yibian ta shi nimen changshi ta de enhui [yushui], yibian chuanbo feng ta de mingling hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen gan'en [zhu].
Zai ni [mu sheng] zhiqian, wo que yi paiqian shizhemen qu jiaohua gezi de zuren. Naxie shizhe yi daizhe mingzheng daoda tamen. Ranhou, wo chengfale fanzui zhe. Yuanzhu xinshi shi wo de zeren.

Shi an la paiqian feng, rang feng ji qi yun, ranhou yi ta [an la] de yiyu sanbu tiankong, ranhou fencheng shu pian, yushi ni kanjian yudian congzhong luoxia. Dang ta shi yu luo zai tasuo yiyu de puren shang shi, tamen mashang huanxin guwu,
suiran ciqian——jiangyu zhiqian, tamen shi juewang de.
Ni guancha an la de enhui de xiaoguo ba! Ta zenyang shi kusi de da di fusu.[Fuhuo ri] ta dique neng shi sizhe fuhuo. Ta dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
Jiaru wo paiqian yizhenfeng [qu huihuai zhang de maosheng de zhuangjia], tamen kanjian [ziji de zhuangjia] bian huangle, tamen xinxi zhihou [yin gu en] you bian cheng liao bu xinyang zhe.
Ni [mu sheng] jue buneng shi sizhe [zhu] tingjian [ni de xuanjiao], ye jue buneng shi zhuanshen likai de longzi tingjian ni de zhaohuan.
Ni geng buneng yindao xiazi tuoli tamen de mi wu. Ni zhi neng shi xinyang wo de qishi zhe tingjian ni de xuanjiao, yinwei tamen shi guishun zhe [musilin].

An la cong nuoruo [de zhuangtai xia] chuangzao nimen, zai nuoruo zhihou, ta shi nimen bian qiangjian, ranhou, zai qiangjian zhihou, ta you shi nimen bian nuoruo he bai fa. Ta yu chuangzao shenme, jiu chuangzao shenme. Ta shi quanzhi de, wanneng de.
Dang fuhuo de shijian lailin zhi ri, fanzui zhe jiang fa [jia] shi [zhu]: Tamen [zai chenshi] zhi tingliule yi xiaoshi. Tamen ruci beili zhenli.
Shou ci [zongjiao] zhishi he “yi ma ni [xinyang]” zhe jiang shuo:“Genju an la de qian ding [zhu], nimen que yi tingliu dao fuhuo ri. Jintian jiushi fuhuo ri, dan nimen bu zhidao.”
Zai na ri, bu yi zhe de bian ci [dui ziji] jiang hao wu yichu, tamen ye bude zai qiu zhu en.
Wo que yi zai zhe bu “gulanjing” zhong wei renlei shezhi ge zhong biyu. Jiaru ni [mu sheng] zhaoshi tamen yi zhong jixiang, bu xinyang zhe bi [dui xinshi] shuo:“Nimen zhishi zhuisui xuwang de ren.”
An la ruci feng bi liao wu zhi zhe de xin.
Suoyi, ni dang jianren. An la de nuoyan que shi zhenshi de, ni buyao rang bu quexin an la zhe fang'ai ni chuanjiao.
Ai lifu, lia mu, mi mu [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhexie shi zhihui de jingdian [“gulanjing”] de jing wen,
shi dui xingshan zhe de yindao he ci min.
Tamen [xingshan zhe] jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, duxin houshi [zhu].
Zhexie ren zunxing cong tamen de zhu qishi de zhengdao, zhexie ren que shi chenggong zhe.

Renmen zhong youren [yi baogui de shijian] huanqu wuliao zhi yan [ru changge he yinyue deng], yibian wuzhi di shi renmen beili an la zhidao, bing ba ta [an la zhidao] dang xiaobing.[Fuhuo ri] zhexie ren [zai huo yu li] bi shou lingru de xingfa.

Dang youren xiang ta songdu wo de qishi shi, ta jiu aoman [zhu] de bi kai, haoxiang meiyou tingjian yiyang, haoxiang ta de er shi long dun de, suoyi, ni [mu sheng] dang xiang ta xuanbu [ta bi shou] tongku de xingfa.
Fan xinyang bing xingshan zhe, tamen jiang huode enze de leyuan,
yong ju qizhong. An la de nuoyan shi zhenshi de. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.

Ta yong nimen kan bujian de zhuzi jianzao zhu tian, bing zai dadishang wengu de anzhi qun shan, yimian nimen sui da di er yaodang, qie zai da dishang sanbu ge zhong dongwu. Wo cong tiankong jiangxia yushui, jie ci er shengzhang chu ge zhong meili de zhiwu.
Zhe jiushi an la de chuangzao. Nimen gaosu wo ba! Nimen she ta [an la] er chongbai de [ouxiang] jiujing neng chuangzao shenme ne? Bu, bu yi zhe shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.

Wo que yi ci gei lu ge man zhihui [he zongjiao zhishi].[Wo shuo]:“Ni dang ganxie an la [de enhui].” Shei gan'en, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wang'enfuyi,[shei zi shou qi hai]. An la que shi wu suo qiu de, shou zansong de.
Dangshi, lu ge man quan jie ta de erzi shuo:“Wo de erzi a! Ni buyao gei an la shezhi huoban, gei an la shezhi huoban que shi danibudao [zhu].”

Wo yi ming ren dang xiaojing fumu [zhu]. Ta de muqin ruo shang jia ruo jiannan de huai ta, ta de duannai shi zai liang niannei.[Wo shuo]:“Ni dang ganxie wo ji ni de fumu, wei wo [an la] zheli shi zuihou de guisu.

Jiaru ta lia qiangpo ni yong ni suo bu zhidao de gei wo shezhi huoban, name, ni jiu buyao fucong ta lia, dan zai jinshi yao shandai ta lia. Ni dang zunxing gui xin wo de ren de dao, ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai, wo jiang ba nimen cengjing suo zuo de gaosu nimen.”

[Lu ge man shuo]:“Wo de erzi a! Shan e de xingwei, sui xiao ruyi li jiezi de zhongliang, jishi ta yincang zai yanshi zhong, huo zai tianshang, huo zai dixia, an la ye yao ba ta xianshi chulai. An la que shi zui minrui de, che zhi de.
Wo de erzi a! Ni dang jin shou bai gong, quan ren xingshan, zhi ren zuo'e, renshou ni suo zaoyu de buxing. Zhe que shi [an la banbu de] yixie mingling.
Ni buyao aoshi renmen, buyao aoman de zai da dishang xingzou. An la jue bu xihuan renhe zi da zikua zhe.
Ni dang bufa wenjian [xianshi bu aoman], dang yadi ni de shengyin, yinwei zui taoyan de shengyin que shi lu de jiao sheng.”

[Renmen a!] Nandao nimen bu zhi dao ma? An la shi tiandi jian de yiqie wei nimen fuwu, bing ba kan de jian zhi wu [ru shumu, dongwu, yushui, ri yue deng] he kan bujian zhi wu [ru xinyang an la he houshi deng] de enhui guang shi gei nimen. Dan renmen zhong reng youren zhenglun an la, ta ji wu zhishi, ye wei shou yindao, qie meiyou yi bu guangming de jingdian.

Dang youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen lai zunxing an la suo jiang shi de jingdian [“gulanjing”] ba!” Tamen jiu shuo:“Bu, women zhi zunxing women faxian women de zuxian suo zunxing de yijiao.” Yaoshi emo zhaohuan tamen qu shou huo yu de xingfa,[nandao tamen ye yao zunxing tamen de zuxian de yijiao ma?]
Shei chedi guishun an la, qie shi xingshan zhe, shei que yi wo zhule zui jiangu de zhizhu [zhu]. Wanshi zuizhong dou jiang gui dao an la nali qu [shoushen].

Zhiyu buxinyang zhe, jue buyao rang ta de bu xin shi ni [mu sheng] youchou. Tamen dou jiang gui dao wo zheli lai, wo jiang ba tamen cengjing suo zuo de gaosu tamen. An la dique quanzhi [renlei] xiongzhong de yiqie.
Wo shi tamen zhanshi xiangle, ranhou, wo jiang poshi tamen qu shou kuxing.
Jiaru ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi?” Tamen bi shuo:“An la.” Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la.” Bu, tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhi dao.
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi an la de. An la que shi wu suo qiu de, shou zansong de.

Jiaru yong da dishang suoyou de shu zuo cheng bi, yi haishui zuo mozhi, bingqie zai jia shang qi ge hai di haishui zuo mozhi, ye buneng xie jin an la de yuyan [zhu]. An la que shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.
Chuangzao nimen he fuhuo nimen, youru [chuangzao he fuhuo] yige ren nayang [jiandan]. An la que shi quan wen de, quan shi de.

Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? An la shi heiye jinru baizhou, shi baizhou jinru heiye, bing shi ri yue [wei nimen] fuwu, mei ge dou an guiding de chengxu yunxing. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi che zhi de.
Zhe shi yinwei, an la que shi zhen zai, tamen she ta er qiqiu dique shi xuwang de. An la que shi zhigaowushang de, zhi da de.

Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ma? Chuanbo yi an la de enhui hangxing yu dahai zhong, yibian ta xiang nimen xianshi ta de yixie jixiang. Dui mei ge jianren zhe he gan'en zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.

Dangshan yiban de botao longzhaozhe tamen shi, tamen jiu qiancheng jingyi di qiqiu an la. Dan dang ta shi tamen ping'an denglu shi, tamen zhong youxie ren jiu caiqu zhe zhong zhidao [jie yu xinyang yu bu xinyang zhi jian]. Wei mei ge beixinqiyi zhe he wang'enfuyi zhe cai hui fouren wo de jixiang.

Renmen a! Nimen dang jingwei nimen de zhu. Nimen dang weiju na yitian, fuqin dui er zi hao wu yichu, erzi dui fuqin ye hao wu yichu. An la de nuoyan que shi zhenshi de, suoyi, buyao rang jinshi shenghuo qipian nimen, buyao rang pian zei [emo] jie an la de mingyi qipian nimen.

Wei an la zhidao fuhuo de shijian, ta jiangxia yushui, ta zhidao zigong zhong suo huai de [tai'er ji qi xingbie]; renhe ren dou bu zhidao ziji mingtian jiang zuo shenme, renhe ren dou bu zhidao ziji jiang si yu he de [zhu]. An la que shi quanzhi de, che zhi de.
Ai lifu, lia mu, mi mu [alabo yu san ge zimu de yinyi, wei an la zui zhidao qi yi].
Zhe bu jingdian [“gulanjing”] shi congzhong shijie de zhu [an la] jiang shi de, qizhong queshi wuyi.

Nandao tamen yao shuo:““Gulanjing” shi ta [mu sheng] weizao de ma?” Bu,“gulanjing” shi cong ni [mu sheng] de zhu jiang shi de zhenli, yibian ni jinggao zai ni zhiqian meiyou renhe jinggao zhe daodaguo de minzhong, yibian tamen zunxing zhengdao.
Shi an la zai liu rinei chuangzaole tiandi wanwu, ranhou sheng shang baozuo. Chu ta wai, nimen jue meiyou renhe baohu zhe he qiuqing zhe. Nandao nimen hai bu jieshou jiaohui ma?
Ta chuli zi tian zhi di de shiwu, ranhou, naxie shiwu jiang zai yi rinei shangsheng dao ta nali. Na yi ri de changdu, shi nimen [zai chenshi] suo jisuan de yiqian nian.
Zhe shi quanzhi yiqie kan bujian zhi wu [zhu] he kan de jian zhi wu de zhu [an la],[ta] shi quanneng de, shi te ci de.
Ta wanshan tasuo chuangzao de wanwu, ta zuichu yong nitu chuangzaole ren.
Ranhou, ta yong wuyong de jingye de jinghua chuangzao ta de houyi.
Ranhou, ta [an la] yunchen di chengxing ta [ren], bing ba linghun chui ru ta de tinei. Ta wei nimen chuangzaole er [tingjue] mu [shijue] xin [siwei], dan nimen hen shao gan'en.
Tamen shuo:“Dang women [si hou] xiaoshi zai dixia shi, nandao women zhen de hai yao bei fuhuo cheng yige xin de shengming ma?” Bu, tamen zai fouren [houshi] yu tamen de zhu xiang hui [zhu].
Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Fengming guanli nimen siwang de tianshi jiang shi nimen siwang, ranhou, nimen dou jiang gui dao nimen de zhu nali qu.”

Yaoshi ni neng kanjian fanzui zhe zai tamen de zhu nali chuitousangqi de qingkuang duo hao a![Tamen jiang shuo]:“Women de zhu a! Women kanjianle, women tingjianle, qiu ni song women hui [chenshi] qu ba! Women yiding zuo shanshi, women zhen de xinyangle.”
Jiaru wo yiyu, wo bi ci gei mei geren zhengdao, dan cong wo fachu de [dui zuo'e zhe de] panjue yi shengxiao, wo biyong jingling he renlei yiqi tian man huo yu.
Nimen changshi [huo yu de] xingfa ba! Yinwei nimen wangjile nimen jinri [yu wo] de xiang hui. Wo dique ye jiang wangji nimen. Nimen changshi yongjiu de xingfa ba! Yinwei nimen chang zuo'e.
Wei zhexie ren xinyang wo de qishi: Dang youren yi wo de qishi quan jie tamen shi, tamen jiu fushou koutou bing zanmei songyang tamen de zhu, erqie tamen bu jiao'ao zi da; koutou chu
tamen ti bu luo chuang, tamen zai weiju he qiwang zhong qiqiu tamen de zhu, bing [wei an la zhi dao] shishe wo suo ciyu tamen de caiwu.
Renhe ren dou bu zhi dao yi [zai leyuan zhong] wei tamen chucangle he zhong jile zhi fu, yi baochou tamen suo zuo de shangong [zhu].
Nandao xinshi yu beini zhe [weikang an la de bu xinyang zhe deng] shi yiyang de ma? Tamen jue bushi yiyang de.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, leyuan jiushi tamen de guisu, zhe shi dui tamen suo zuo shangong de kuandai.

Zhiyu beini zhe, huo yu jiushi tamen de guisu. Mei dang tamen xiang taoli huo yu shi, tamen you bei gan huiqu. You hua sheng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen changshi nimen [zai chenshi] suo fouren de huo yu de xingfa ba!”
Zai [houshi] zuida de xingfa lailin qian, wo bi shi tamen changshi zuijin de [xiao] xingfa [rujin shi suo zao de zainan], yibian tamen huiguo zi xin.
Youren yi ta de zhu de qishi quan jie ta, er ta que beiqi ta, shei bi zhe zhong ren geng bu yi ne? Wo bi jiang chengfa fanzui zhe.

Wo que yi ci gei mu sa jingdian [“tao la te”], suoyi, ni buyao huaiyi hui yu ta xiang hui [ru mu sheng sheng xiao zhi ye yu mu sa de xiang hui]. Wo ceng shi na bu jingdian chengwei yiselie de houyi de zhinan.
Dang tamen [yiselie de houyi] jianren bing quexin wo de qishi shi, wo ceng renming tamen zhong de yixie ren zuo lingxiu, tamen [naxie lingxiu] feng wo de mingling yindao renmen [zunxing zhengdao].
Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu bi wei tamen panjue tamen suo fenqi de.

Nandao tamen meiyou huode yindao [huo nandao tamen bu zhidao] ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen chang cong zhexie ren de guju shang zouguo. Ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang, tamen weihe bu tingcong ne?

Nandao tamen mei kanjian ma? Wo ba yushui [han yu de yun] gan dao wu zhiwu shengzhang de gan de, jie ci er shengzhang chu zhuangjia [zhu 1], gong tamen de shengchu [zhu 2] he tamen ziji chi ma? Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian ma?
Tamen shuo:“Jiaru nimen shi chengshi zhe,[women yu nimen zhi jian de] zhege panjue he shi shixian ne?”
Ni shuo:“Shenpan ri, dui bu xinyang zhe lai shuo,[na shi] jishi tamen xinyang, dui tamen yeshi wuyi de, tamen jiang bu bei huanxing.”
Ni [mu sheng] dang bi kai tamen, ni dang dengdai. Tamen dique ye zai dengdai.
Xianzhi [mu sheng] a! Ni dang jingwei an la, ni buyao fucong bu xinyang zhe he wei xinzhe. An la que shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.
Ni dang zunxing cong ni de zhu qishi ni de “gulanjing”. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi che zhi de.
Ni dang xinlai an la. An la zuyi zuo jianhu zhe.

An la weiceng zai renhe ren de xiongzhong chuangzao liang ge xin; nimen wei xiu qi er ba nimen de qizi cheng wei nimen de muqin, qishi, ta [an la] wei ba tamen dang zuo nimen de muqin, ye wei ba nimen de yi zi dang zuo nimen de erzi. Zhe shi nimen xinkoukaihe dehua. An la shi jiang zhenli de, shi yindao [nimen zunxing] zhengdao de.

Nimen dang yi tamen [yi zi] de fuqin de xingshi chenghu tamen, zai an la kan lai, zhe shi zui gongzheng de. Jiaru nimen bu zhidao tamen de fuqin shi shei, name, tamen jiushi nimen tong jiao de xiongdi he qinyou. Fan nimen wuyi fan de cuo [zhu], dui nimen shi wu zui de, dan nimen de xin youyi fan de cuo,[dui nimen ze shi youzui de]. An la shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.

Xianzhi [mu sheng] dui xinshi di qinmi guanxi shengguo tamen dui tamen ziji [zhu]. Ta [mu sheng] de qizimen youru tamen [xinshi] de muqin [yi ji ying zunjing tamen, buke qu tamen wei qi]. Zai an la de [jicheng] faling zhong, xueqin yu xueqin xianghu jian de qinmi guanxi shengguo xinshi he qian shi [likai mai jia sui mu sheng yiqi qianyi dao mai di na de musilin] jian de [fei xueqin] xiongdi guanxi, nimen dui nimen de xiongdi xingshan chuwai. Zhe shi jilu zai tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong de.
Dangshi, wo dui xianzhimen yuefa, dui ni [mu sheng], nu ha, yi bu la xin, mu sa, ma'er ya zhizi er sa yuefa, wo dui tamen li xiale zhuangyan de shiyue,
yibian ta [an la] xunwen tamen dui zhenli de chengshi [ru shifou rushi xuanchuan an la de qishi]. Ta wei bu xinyang zhe zhunbeile tongku de xingfa.

Xinshimen a! Nimen dang laoji an la dui nimen de enhui. Dangshi [meng jun zhanyi qijian], di jun lai gongda nimen, wo pai kuangfeng he nimen suo kan bujian de jundui [tianbing] qu chengfa tamen. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quan shi de.
Dangshi, tamen [diren] cong nimen de shangmian he xiamian gongda nimen; dangshi, nimen jinghuang shicuo, bing dui an la zuo zhongzhong caiyi.
Dangshi, xinshimen shen shou kaoyan, shen gan zhendong.
Dangshi, wei xinzhe [zhu] he xinzhong you bing [huaiyi] zhe shuo:“An la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] dui women de xunuo zhishi qipian eryi.”

Dangshi, tamen zhong youyi huo ren shuo:“Ye si li bu [mai di na] ren a!
